meeting.noMeetingsDesc: Start recording a meeting or upload an existing audio file.
meeting.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this meeting? This action cannot be undone.
meeting.clickToStartTranscription: Click the button to start transcription
meeting.transcribingDesc: This may take a few minutes depending on the audio length
meeting.noSummaryDesc: Generate an AI-powered summary with key points and action items
meeting.editSpeakerNames: Edit speaker names to improve transcript readability
meeting.entitiesDesc: People, organizations, and topics mentioned in this meeting
meeting.noEntitiesDesc: Click Extract to identify people, organizations, and topics

recording.selectModeFirst: Select a recording mode above to start
recording.shareAudioWarning: Make sure to check 'Share audio' when sharing your screen
recording.tooShort: Please record at least a few seconds

upload.title: Upload Audio
upload.dropzone: Drag and drop audio file here, or click to select
upload.contextDesc: Add details about the meeting to improve transcription and summary
upload.contextPlaceholder: e.g., Weekly team meeting, brainstorm for new project...
upload.supportedFormats: Supported formats: MP3, WAV, M4A, MP4, WebM
upload.selectAudioFile: Please select an audio or video file
upload.readyToProcess: Ready to process. You can still edit the context above.

auth.signInDescription: Sign in to your account to continue

home.title: Meeting Intelligence
home.subtitle: Hebrew-first meeting transcription, summarization, and AI-powered analysis. Record, upload, and get insights from your meetings.

features.transcriptDesc: Automatic transcription with speaker detection in Hebrew and English.
features.questionsDesc: Ask questions about your meetings and get AI-powered answers.

entities.title: Entities
entities.description: People, organizations, projects and topics identified in your meetings
entities.noEntitiesDesc: Entities will appear here after you create meetings and run entity extraction

systemAudio.title: How it works
systemAudio.step2: In the dialog, select the screen or window you want to share
systemAudio.step3: Important: Check the 'Share audio' option at the bottom
systemAudio.note: Note: System audio recording requires screen sharing with audio enabled.

memory.title: Memory
memory.description: Ask questions across all your meetings
memory.placeholder: What did we decide about the pricing strategy?
memory.noMeetingsDesc: Start by recording or uploading meetings to build your memory.

search.title: Search
search.noResultsDesc: Try a different search term or make sure you have meetings with transcripts.
